info.name: Piratebay: DeepDark
info.description:
This is the one you were looking for... A fix up / mix-match of these themes.
 Deep Dark by shellcore13 modified 
http://userstyles.org/styles/79856/the-pirate-bay-deep-dark-by-shellcore13-modified
 Deep Dark by shellcore13
http://userstyles.org/styles/63032/the-pirate-bay-deep-dark

I intend to update it to look more like this one for Google
 http://userstyles.org/styles/81403/gt-deepdark-for-google

The style is best viewed using FT Deep Dark (Firefox) or Sobrio(Chrome) themes for browser - also made by Sr21 (http://userstyles.org/users/139419) I love this guys themes - check out his VLC one too: http://sr21.deviantart.com/
